title: RateType
description: Used to represent the numerical quotient resulting from a comparison of two independent things such as a quantity measured with respect to another measured quantity.

unitCode.description: The unit code of the value.

currencyCode.description: The currency code of the value

baseMultiplier.description: The base multiplier of the value.

baseUnitCode.description: The base unit code of the value.

baseCurrencyCode.description: The base currency code of the value.
